title: DW Drone
description:
[GPS versions] This application contains aerial photograph, V sign, face tracking. And these function of preview, take  photos , picture recording can come true by HuiYuan's UAV. You can also through the classic, body feeling or rocker model to control the UAV.
【PS:When the map cannot be loaded, you need to disconnect the WiFi from the aircraft. When the mobile phone can access the Internet, launch the APP to load the map.】
descriptionHTML:
[GPS versions] This application contains aerial photograph, V sign, face tracking. And these function of preview, take photos , picture recording can come true by HuiYuan's UAV. You can also through the classic, body feeling or rocker model to control the UAV.
【PS:When the map cannot be loaded, you need to disconnect the WiFi from the aircraft. When the mobile phone can access the Internet, launch the APP to load the map.】
